quality.en: low quality, worst quality, lowres, blurry, out of focus, jpeg artifacts, watermark, text, logo, signature
quality.cn: 低质量, 模糊, 水印, 文字, 标志

anatomy.en: deformed, distorted, disfigured, extra limbs, extra fingers, missing fingers, mutated hands, bad anatomy, bad proportions, malformed limbs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck
anatomy.cn: 变形, 扭曲, 多余肢体, 手指错误, 解剖错误

face.en: distorted face, asymmetrical face, ugly face, poorly drawn face, poorly drawn eyes, cross-eyed, weird eyes, extra eyes
face.cn: 脸部变形, 不对称, 眼睛错误

style_conflicts.for_realistic: cartoon, anime, 3d render, cgi, painting, illustration, drawing, sketch, art
style_conflicts.for_anime: photorealistic, photograph, real photo, 3d render, cgi
style_conflicts.for_2.5d: pure anime, pure cartoon, overly realistic, photograph

midjourney.recommended_negative: Avoid using negative prompts directly; use --no flag instead

stable_diffusion.recommended_negative: (worst quality:1.4), (low quality:1.4), lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name

dalle.recommended_negative: DALL-E doesn't support negative prompts; describe what you want positively
dalle.workaround: Use phrases like 'high quality, sharp focus, no blur' instead

character_safety.en: duplicate person, clone, twin, multiple versions of same person

scene_safety.en: inconsistent lighting, mixed time of day, anachronistic elements
scene_safety.cn: 光线不一致, 时间矛盾

assembled_negative_example.realistic_character: low quality, worst quality, blurry, watermark, deformed, extra fingers, bad anatomy, distorted face, asymmetrical eyes, cartoon, anime, 3d render
assembled_negative_example.realistic_scene: low quality, worst quality, blurry, watermark, inconsistent lighting, anachronistic elements, cartoon, anime
